info.headline: Winter Storm Warning issued January 01 at 4:55AM MST until January 01 at 11:00AM MST by NWS GrandJunction
info.description: ...WINTER STORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 11 AM MST THIS MORNING... * WHAT...Heavy snow. Additional snow accumulations of 1 to 4 inches in the higher elevations, with total snow accumulations of 15 to 30 inches with locally higher amounts. Winds gusting as high as 40 mph. * WHERE...In Utah, La Sal and Abajo Mountains. In Colorado, Grand and Battlement Mesas, Uncompahgre Plateau and Dallas Divide and West Elk and Sawatch Mountains. * WHEN...Until 11 AM MST this morning. * IMPACTS...Plan on slippery road conditions. Patchy blowing snow could significantly reduce visibility, especially on ridge tops and mountain passes. A detailed map of the snowfall can be found at: www.weather.gov/gjt/winter.
info.instruction: If you must travel, keep an extra flashlight, food, and water in your vehicle in case of an emergency. The latest road conditions for the state you are calling from can be obtained by calling 5 1 1.
